node.html: A program that computes a TF-ICF value for each word in a corpus of documents using Hadoop MapReduce.
A custom version of OpenMPI using sockets for communication between nodes.

Designed and built an application along with a database for a marketplace that manages customer loyalty programs for different brands. The database will handle all the store operations related to Marketplace admin, brands, loyalty programs, customers, wallet etc.
A Basic Compiler containing a lexer, LL(1) parser, AST tree generator, semantic analyzer, type checker and an intermediate code generator.
Implemented NER Tagger and POS Tagging for Indian language code mixed sentences. Advisor : Dr. Yashvardhan Sharma
A simple Question Answering System to answer W type questions (Who , Why, Where). The system has been adapted from the paper "An Analysis of the AskMSR Question-Answering System".
A Mood Detection System based on Histogram of Oriented Gradients(HOG) for each part of the face trained using a SVM.
